short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View http(s) headers for the current webpage request

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View and inspect HTTP(s) headers for the current webpage request. Any status code other than 200 is shown in the extension icon for improved visibility.

Use the response of the original request of the page, so no additional requests are made.
A lightweight extension, featuring minimal dark theme for fast access of current http response.

Features:
★ Features a minimal dark design, that uses colors with high contrast
★ Shows a badge for pages that have any status code other than 200
★ Refreshes automatically when a new response comes in
★ Uses an icon that works well for both dark and light mode on Mac
★ Inspect cookies set by remote site
★ Quickly check if you are seeing cached content
★ Quickly detect if you are on an SPA (if url changes makes no new requests)
★ Open source, and so your security and privacy is guaranteed

Github url: https://github.com/developer-extensions/minimal-http-headers
